news_header: Kamala Harris has 61.5 million votes, while Donald Trump has 66.7 million votes in a close US presidential election.
news_text: The US presidential election has seen Kamala Harris of the Democrat party receiving 61,542,467 votes (47.2%) and Donald Trump of the Republican party receiving 66,714,092 votes (51.2%). Polls have closed, and while Trump is projected to win in some swing states, the final results are still pending. High voter turnout has been noted, and counting continues, with potential recounts and legal challenges expected. The electoral college process will ultimately determine the winner, with the inauguration scheduled for January 20, 2025.
